name: OpenStack.NET
tagline: Enabling the open cloud for Microsoft .NET developers
body:
# An OpenStack SDK for Microsoft .NET #

OpenStack.NET is an SDK written for the Microsoft .NET platform, designed to enable developers to seamlessly work with the many services provided by the OpenStack cloud operating system.

The OpenStack.NET SDK contains:

* A language API
* Getting Started Guide
* API Reference Manual
* Release Notes
* Sample code

You can view our [API documentation](http://openstacknetsdk.org/docs/) or some [sample code](https://github.com/openstacknetsdk/openstack.net/wiki).

## Getting Started ##

To install the SDK into your project, you will need:

* Visual Studio 2013 or higher
* .NET 4.5 or higher

Once you have your .NET project created, you can install the SDK using the [NuGet Package Manager Console](http://docs.nuget.org/docs/start-here/using-the-package-manager-console).

To install OpenStack.NET, run the following command in the Package Manager Console:

PM> Install-Package openstack.net

For getting started with our Rackspace providers, please see our [sample code](https://github.com/openstacknetsdk/openstack.net/wiki/Code-Samples).
